CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 29, 1969, pg. 1, reads: "After learning that hospital administrators agreed to recognize their union, workers at the Jewish Home and Hospital give a victory sign indicating that their November 20 demonstration was successful in influencing administrators of that hospital to recognize  their 119, RWDSU AFL-CIO, Drug and Hospital Employees Local." - Harris Photo.
TitMainTitle: Group of workers from the Jewish Home and Hospital wearing paper hats, holding their hands up in victory sign after their union, 1199 RWDSU Drug and Hospital Workers Local, was recognized
